titleStmt.title: A letter to the Quakers, viz., to Geo. Fox, Geo. Whitehead, Fra. Camfield, Stephen Crisp, and the rest of your preachers
titleStmt.author: Bugg, Francis, 1640-1724?

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for S. Norris and are to be sold by most booksellers in London,

notesStmt.note: Attributed to Francis Bugg. Cf. Wing.
Item at reel 838:20 incorrectly identified as Wing B5374.
Reproductions of original in Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
